name: Super Crazy Bowling
description:
Super Crazy Bowling is a combo of 10 pin bowling and mini-golf. Play across a series of wacky stages on your own or against friends locally.  Every shot matters so can you get the lowest score possible and be the best bowler on the planet.

  • Play 10 unique frames
  • Up to 8 player local multiplayer
  • Encounter wacky and challenging senarios

We have a devlog about the making of this game: https://youtu.be/lcp_ew3OA5U

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/Gnjm2mCj

Game music: www.bensound.com
